FuncDef:
The tunnel load-balance by-tunnel command enables tunnel load balancing based on the number of tunnels on tunnel boards bound to an LNS group.
The undo tunnel load-balance by-tunnel command disables tunnel load balancing among tunnel boards bound to an LNS group.
By default, tunnel load balancing is disabled among tunnel boards bound to an LNS group.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When multiple tunnel boards are bound to an LNS group, to implement tunnel load balancing among the tunnel boards, run the tunnel load-balance by-tunnel command.
Configuration Impact
After the tunnel load-balance by-tunnel command is run, tunnels are preferentially established on the tunnel board that has the fewest tunnels.
